item.title: 智利锂矿开采商 SQM 与中国合作伙伴就 Codelco 交易发生争执
item.description: 智利矿业公司 SQM 董事会主席质疑其大股东中国天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp）的动机有问题，这是 SQM 计划与国有铜生产商 Codelco 建立合作伙伴关系一事日益公开的最新争论。【原文：Chilean miner SQM's board chairman challenged what he called the questionable motives of a major shareholder, China's Tianqi Lithium Corp, the latest jab in an increasingly public spat over SQM's planned partnership with state copper producer Codelco.】

item.title: 美国联邦住房与家庭管理局（FHFA）称，1 月份美国房价年增长率放缓
item.description: 周二公布的数据显示，1月份美国年度房价涨幅放缓，月度房价17个月来首次下滑。【原文：U.S. annual home prices rose at a slower rate in January and slipped on a monthly basis for the first time in 17 months, data released Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 万事达卡和威士卡就信用卡费用达成 300 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 威士公司和万事达公司达成了约 300 亿美元的和解协议，限制商家的信用卡和借记卡费用，部分节省下来的费用可能会通过降低价格转嫁给消费者。【原文：Visa and Mastercard reached an estimated $30 billion settlement to limit credit and debit card fees for merchants, with some savings likely to be passed on to consumers through lower prices.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 正考虑出售 Victor Allen's 咖啡的所有者 Trilliant
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的人士称，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 正在考虑出售 Trilliant Food & Nutrition，该公司对 Victor Allen's 和 Aspen Ridge 咖啡品牌背后的美国公司的估值约为 6 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone is considering a sale of Trilliant Food & Nutrition that could value the U.S. company behind the Victor Allen's and Aspen Ridge coffee brands at about $600 million including debt, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧盟在狗药反垄断调查中将 Zoetis 作为目标
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，已对美国宠物产品制造商 Zoetis 公司可能违反欧盟竞争规则的行为展开反垄断调查。【原文：The European Commission on Tuesday said it had opened an antitrust investigation into possible breaches of EU competition rules by U.S. pet products maker Zoetis .】

item.title: 加拿大鹅公司将裁员 17
item.description: 加拿大鹅（Canada Goose）周二表示，由于消费者支出疲软，这家奢侈风衣制造商希望控制成本，因此将削减约 17% 的公司职位。【原文：Canada Goose , on Tuesday said it would be reducing about 17% of its corporate roles, as the luxury parka maker looks to rein in costs amid weaker consumer spending.】

item.title: 巴西央行讨论，如果不确定性持续存在，降息幅度将缩小
item.description: 巴西央行利率制定委员会周二表示，考虑到国内和国际不确定性加剧的风险，该委员会内部出现了关于未来更适度降息的讨论。【原文：Discussions on more modest interest rate cuts in the future emerged within Brazil's central bank rate-setting committee, the bank said on Tuesday, citing the risk of heightened uncertainty domestically and internationally.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称，Arista Networks 前董事长就内幕交易指控达成和解
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周二表示，Arista Networks 创始人兼前董事长 Andreas Bechtolsheim 同意支付近 100 万美元的民事罚款，以了结内幕交易指控。【原文：Arista Networks founder and former chairman Andreas Bechtolsheim agreed to pay a civil penalty of nearly $1 million to settle insider trading charges, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西 3 月中旬居民消费价格上涨，但全年通胀放缓
item.description: 巴西地理统计局（IBGE）周二公布的数据显示，3月中旬巴西消费者物价涨幅略高于预期，但12个月通胀率仍放缓至去年年中以来的最低水平。【原文：Consumer prices in Brazil rose slightly more than expected in their mid-March reading but 12-month inflation still slowed to its lowest level since the middle of last year, data from statistics agency IBGE showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 福特与 Allego 合作在欧洲各地的经销商处为电动汽车快速充电
item.description: 福特和快速电动汽车充电网络 Allego 周二表示，作为新合作关系的一部分，他们将在美国汽车制造商的许多欧洲经销商处为福特客户和公众推出超快速充电器。【原文：Ford and fast electric vehicle charging network Allego said on Tuesday they would roll out ultra-fast chargers for Ford customers and public use across many of the U.S. automaker's European dealerships as part of a new partnership.】

item.title: 两家竞标者正在洽谈收购德国零售巨头 Galeria
item.description: 德国百货巨头卡尔斯塔德考夫霍夫百货公司（Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof）的破产管理人周二表示，将与两家竞标者进行谈判，他们希望收购这家在母公司 Signa 倒闭后申请破产的德国最著名零售商。【原文：The insolvency manager of German department store giant Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof said on Tuesday it will hold talks with two bidders who want to buy the nation's most prominent retailer that filed for insolvency after the collapse of its parent Signa.】

item.title: 中国电动车巨头比亚迪季度利润增速为两年来最慢
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周二公布第四季度利润增长 18.6%，为 2022 年第一季度以来增速最慢的季度，原因是在残酷的价格战中，电动汽车在全球最大汽车市场的销售失去了动力。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD reported an 18.6% rise in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, its slowest since the first quarter of 2022, as EV sales lost momentum in the world's biggest auto market amid a brutal price war.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份耐用品订单反弹
item.description: 2 月份美国长期制成品订单的增长超过预期，而第一季度的设备商业投资似乎有所改善。【原文：Orders for long-lasting U.S. manufactured goods increased more than expected in February, while business investment on equipment appeared to improve in the first quarter.】

item.title: 西班牙将继续增持西班牙电信 10%的股份，但对价格保持警惕
item.description: 西班牙政府发言人皮拉尔-阿莱格里亚（Pilar Alegria）周二表示，西班牙将尽快完成收购电信巨头西班牙电信公司（Telefonica）10%股份的计划，但会逐步推进，以免影响股价。【原文：Spain will complete its planned acquisition of a 10% stake in telecoms giant Telefonica as soon as possible, but will build up to it so as to not impact the share price, government spokesperson Pilar Alegria said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司股票在纳斯达克上市前跳涨
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体和技术公司在宣布与一家空头公司合并两年多后，于周二收盘前在纳斯达克上市，股价大涨近 20%。【原文：Shares of Donald Trump's media and technology company jumped nearly 20% before the bell on Tuesday in the run-up to their Nasdaq debut after more than two years since its merger with a blank-check firm was announced.】

item.title: 与麦当劳合作走向全国后，Krispy Kreme 股价大涨
item.description: 周二，Krispy Kreme 的股价在盘前交易中最高飙升了 23%，因为该公司和麦当劳表示，他们计划到 2026 年底在这家快餐巨头的美国餐厅中提供 Krispy Kreme 的甜甜圈。【原文：Shares of Krispy Kreme surged as much as 23% in premarket trade on Tuesday after the company and McDonald's said they plan to provide Krispy Kreme's donuts across the fast-food giant's U.S. restaurants by the end of 2026.】

item.title: 福特重申年度核心利润展望
item.description: 福特汽车周二重申了其年度核心利润展望。【原文：Ford Motor reaffirmed its annual core profit outlook on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德的芬克谈美国退休危机，宣布推出 "LifePath Paycheck
item.description: 贝莱德首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）敦促政府和私营部门确保美国人有足够的钱退休，并表示这家全球最大的资产管理公司将在下个月推出一款产品来解决这一问题。【原文：BlackRock CEO Larry Fink has urged the government and the private sector to ensure Americans have enough money to retire and said the world's largest asset manager would launch a product next month to address the issue.】

item.title: 基因治疗制造商蓝鸟公司因会计错误重报 2022 年财务数据
item.description: 基因治疗生产商蓝鸟生物周二表示，由于会计差错，公司计划重报 2022 年以及 2022 年和 2023 年前三个季度的财务报表。【原文：Gene therapy maker bluebird bio said on Tuesday it plans to restate its financial statements for 2022 and for each of the first three quarters of 2022 and 2023 following accounting errors.】

item.title: 香料生产商麦考密克因销量稳定、价格上涨而实现季度业绩增长
item.description: 麦考密克公司周二公布的第一季度销售额和利润超出市场预期，原因是在通胀持续高企的情况下，消费者对其高价香料和调味料的需求依然强劲。【原文：McCormick beat market expectations for first-quarter sales and profit on Tuesday, as consumer demand for its high-priced spices and seasonings held amid sticky inflation.】

item.title: Viking Therapeutics 公司称其实验性药片在早期研究中减轻了体重
item.description: 维京治疗公司（Viking Therapeutics）周二表示，在一项早期试验中，该公司生产的实验性片剂有助于减轻患者的体重，而且在研究中被证明是安全有效的。【原文：Viking Therapeutics said on Tuesday its experimental tablet helped reduce weight in patients in an early-stage trial and was shown to be safe and effective in the study.】

item.title: 投资者为北美公司提交的气候决议数量创历史新高
item.description: 本周二的一项新统计显示，今年迄今为止，北美公司年会上共提交了 263 项与气候相关的股东决议，创下了历史新高。【原文：A record 263 climate-related shareholder resolutions have been filed so far this year for annual meetings of North American companies, a new tally showed on Tuesday, with proponents tailoring their wording to gain support.】

item.title: 丰田官方表示，计划到 2025 年量产电池 Hilux 皮卡车
item.description: 日本丰田公司泰国分公司总裁周二表示，该公司计划在 2025 年底前量产电池电动 Hilux 皮卡车。【原文：Japan's Toyota plans to mass-produce a battery electric Hilux pickup truck by the end of 2025, the president of its Thailand unit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国在世贸组织就 "歧视性补贴 "问题与美国展开争端
item.description: 中国常驻世贸组织代表团周二表示，中国已在世界贸易组织（WTO）启动针对美国的争端解决程序，以维护中国在电动汽车行业的利益。【原文：China has initiated dispute settlement proceedings against the United States at the World Trade Organization (WTO) to safeguard its interests in the electric vehicle industry, the Chinese permanent mission to the WTO said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雷诺高管表示，正与合作伙伴就回收电池进行深入洽谈
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺公司的一位高管表示，该公司正在与潜在合作伙伴就从废旧电动汽车电池中提取和回收锂及其他金属进行深入讨论，以寻求重新利用更多的战略原材料。【原文：French automaker Renault is in advanced discussions with potential partners to extract and recycle lithium and other metals from used electric vehicle batteries, a company executive said, as it seeks to reuse more of the strategic raw materials.】

item.title: 储蓄可能不是欧洲经济战的超级武器
item.description: 在欧洲寻求与经济竞争对手抗衡的过程中，政客们认为他们拥有一种秘密武器：尚未开发的公民储蓄。【原文：As Europe seeks to hold its ground against economic rivals, politicians think they have a secret weapon: the untapped savings of its citizens.】

item.title: 联合包裹服务公司预测 2026 年收入高于预期
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二预测，2026 年的综合收入将好于预期，因为该公司正在努力积极削减成本并抢占市场份额。【原文：United Parcel Service forecast better-than-expected 2026 consolidated revenue on Tuesday, as it works to aggressively cut costs and capture market share.】

item.title: 尽管遭到抗议，匈牙利仍不会重新实施乌克兰蜂蜜进口禁令
item.description: 尽管蜜农提出抗议，称来自乌克兰的廉价蜂蜜压低了价格，并有可能使他们破产，但匈牙利不会重新出台禁止从乌克兰进口蜂蜜的禁令。【原文：Hungary will not reintroduce a ban on honey imported from Ukraine despite demands by honey farmers who have protested saying cheap honey from Ukraine pushed down prices and threatens to drive them out of business.】

item.title: 独家报道美国立法者要求FDA就检查马斯克的Neuralink公司一事做出答复
item.description: 一位参与卫生政策制定的美国立法者向美国食品和药物管理局询问，为什么在允许埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的神经链接公司（Neuralink）对其设备进行人体试验之前，没有对该公司进行检查。【原文：A U.S. lawmaker involved in health policy has asked the Food and Drug Administration why it did not inspect Elon Musk's Neuralink before allowing the brain implant company to test its device in humans.】

item.title: 早间竞标：三月市场平静，第一季度渐行渐远
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】
